In college, we have separate training for the placements. We have skilled professional teachers 
for the placement training. We start the placement training for the students in the 3rd academic year.
Placements are available at Park College of Engineering and Technology which open up career opportunities
for the students studying here across all specialisations. The placement record as provided by the college 
includes top recruiters such as Capgemini, TCS, Kia Motors, Tata Motors, Bosch, Wipro and Oracle. Visit this 
link to know the placement record provided by the college - http://www.pcet.ac.in/placements/activities/. 
The highest package was around 4.5 lakhs p.a. and the average package is 2-2.5 lakhs p.a

The Park College of Engineering and Technology was started in 1996 and is situated on 
the National Highway NH 544 in Kaniyur at 28 km east from the industrial city of Coimbatore 
in Tamilnadu. It is located on a sprawling 30 acres of land surrounded by green fields and
coconut Groves on its three sides, and a chain of industries on the other. The College
buildings, hostels, workshops and Laboratories, playgrounds and gardens are laid out tastefully 
and functionally by Architects and experienced academicians and educationists rendering 
the premises a right place forliving, learning and working. The College is
affiliated to Anna University, Chennai and is approved by AICTE, Delhi. It is also 
an ISO Certified Institution. The Director of Technical Education of the Government 
of Tamilnadu is the supervisory authority over the College. The College is a 
co-educational self-financed private institution and aims at excellence and 
leadership in the field of technical education.the College is located not very far from 
the highly industrialized city of Coimbatore, and far enough to escape from 
the urban related problems. The College provides for learning in its class rooms 
and laboratories, during the regular working hours and also outside the class-rooms, 
beyond the working hours The facilities in the college are so planned as to make 
the College an ideal place for teaching and learning.While providing quality education 
using all modern teaching methods and technologies. the college places emphasis 
on extra curricular activities and physical education, to achieve all round development 
of its students. Behind every machine, tool, equipment and operation system there are
sharp minds and skillful hands that design. Develop and put it all together. The expert knowledge 
and special skills at the command of a few are transferred to millions of men and 
women through education and training. We enable the students to sharpen their minds and 
to discover the power behind their hands at Park College of Engineering and Technology. 
The PCET closely watches developments in industry all over the world and strives to provide 
students with the kind of technical education they need to succeed in the world of work.

To create infrastructure and facilities of very high standards. To Maintain world class laboratories,
 		workshop and educational resources for learning, teaching and research.

		To, Ensure effective implementation of the given curricula through highly qualified and competent faculty.

		To Provide continuous evaluation, assessment, test and examinations for improving the quality of its educational input processes and outputs.

To pioneer potentials of students and faculty in engineering education through world class 
 		infrastructure and educational resources for learning, teaching and research.
DR.P.V.Ravi is the Chairman of Park college of engineering and technology.
Mrs.Prema Ravi is the founder of Park college of engineering and technology.

Our college offers some scholarship for students which is 50% concession for students above 80% and 
some other scholarship for socially backward students and some other scholarship for students who are medically disabled
 A lot of Government scholarship schemes can be used to take admission at Park College of Engineering and Technology.
The college also provides scholarships to students who are meritorious or those who are in need, based on some eligibility conditions.
Students will have to attend the scholarship test and personal interview for attaining scholarship through which they can get upto 100% fee waiver based on their merit and need.

Yes, hostel is very good here and have a medium cost as much as others.and having security, and maintance, separate warden and so on.

The college library is a 8000 sqft space situated on the ground floor of Techno Park. 
	It provides services to its students by providing valuable information in the form of books, 
	journals and other materials relevant to their fields of study. It also provides access to digital resources. It is fully computerised and an
	OPAC system is available which can verify the current status of books in the library.

: The campus has a ground of 12 acres to facilitate various sports such as cricket,
	 basketball, volleyball, football, tennis and badminton among many others. Indoor games
	 include table tennis, carrom board, chess etc., Gym and yoga facilities are also available
	 for students to utilize according to their needs.

Apart from the computer labs that have been set up for practical learning as part of the courses, 
	 the college also provides computer and internet centres for general purposes and learning 
	 during free time. These facilities are available to students beyond their college hours in order to help them work on their research projects etc..
Mrs.Prema Ravi is the founder of Park college of engineering and technology.
